Reviews.Title: i9300
Reviews.Author: JRM91
Reviews.Content: The phone was just horrible buttons are too small abotu the size of an ant. The camera quality is horrible. The contacts delete themselves. The buttons stick. The time keeps changing on its own. The seller is not polite. The so called manual didn't specifyor stated how to work the phone it looked like a folded pece of paper with words on it. I supposedly got it for my phone for my mom she just hated it. She likes to record music and use them as ringtones she couldn't do that and she compained about basically everything the camera, contact storage on phone, the time changing, and so on.The phone came after the time it was suppose to.

Reviews.Title: Dont order!!!!
Reviews.Author: jazsmine
Reviews.Content: This phone was suppose to be a Christmas present and its jan.23 and still hasn't received it and hasn't gotten an refund .we will never order from this company again.DO Not!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: ijena miller
Reviews.Content: The item was not as describe. Has no android os can't access the Internet the screen you have to touch so hard to get it move can't hear from the phone it was just terrible would not purchase another one again

Reviews.Title: I got it what I paid for
Reviews.Author: Edgar reyes
Reviews.Content: I have been buying worldwide  along the last five years and  this is my first disappointing experience. The product  description is made to deceive you.  The lebels in the box make you happy because they convince you have made a good choice, but just matter to open the box and,  and OMG! I have been fooled

Reviews.Title: Did not like
Reviews.Author: Patricia Tristan
Reviews.Content: the phone was plastic and flimsy and i did not like it at all!! I actually returned the item for refund

Reviews.Title: Total crappy phone
Reviews.Author: M.Rose
Reviews.Content: This phone is a piece of shXt. it doesn't send pictures and for the screen you have to use your fingernails just a waste of money!!

ProductInfo.Features:
Android OS
GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz
Dual SIM, Dual standby
Dual cameras (the back one with flash light)
Bluetooth
ProductInfo.Name: i9300 Quad Band Dual SIM Cell Phone with Bluetooth 4.0 inch Touch Screen WIFI (White)
